item.title: Swing Databinding with Mogwai DataBinding
item.description: While you are developing Java Swing based applications, you need a mechanism to bind Java objects to Swing widgets. Project mogwai.sourceforge.net provides a very simple but powerful framework called DataBinding to help you with this task. Here is an example.
